description: Every year Dr Earl Owen at Sydney's Prince of Wales Hospital conducts a two day work shop in microsurgery for other interested doctors. The film shows doctors working on models and live patients while Dr Owen explains some operating techniques which he uses particularly in cases of severed fingers.
